teaser: A look back at April, and the changing demographic of horse owners.
description: A look back at April, and the changing demographic of horse owners.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, May 1, 2015
title: PODCAST: Off to the races
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

April was a decidedly mixed month for the economy. We take a look back. Plus, if luck is a lady then some ladies may get lucky at the racetrack this season. Traditionally, horse racing is a field dominated by men: male owners, male trainers, male jockeys. But now, ladies want in.

"}]
contentencoded: April was a decidedly mixed month for the economy. We take a look back. Plus, if luck is a lady then some ladies may get lucky at the racetrack this season. Traditionally, horse racing is a field dominated by men: male owners, male trainers, male jockeys. But now, ladies want in.
